text: Bellevue High School, also known as Bellevue School, is a public high school located in Bellevue, Texas (USA). It is the sole high school in the Bellevue Independent School District. In 2015, the school was rated "Met Standard" by the Texas Education Agency. ==Athletics== The Bellevue Eagles compete in the following sports: *Basketball *Cross Country *Golf *Tennis *Track and Field ==References== == External links == * Official Website Category:Public high schools in Texas Category:Schools in Clay County, Texas
title: Bellevue High School (Texas)
